chapters.title: Chapter 6: A Stave and a Razor
chapters.info: Latelle Luca, p. 180—Woman with a stern face and dark eyes that performs with bears in Valan Luca's menagerie. She is Valan's wife. Mat suspects that Latelle's bears do their tricks for fear she might bite them. She is a bad cook, to Mat's estimation; she uses too much spice. See also Luca, Valan.
